channel.title: Jagex blocking all file downloads?
channel.description:
[center]Every source I see, that I would like to use as a nice base, fagex seems to have deleted the download.
Is this the case for anyone else? [/center]

item.title: Jagex blocking all file downloads?
item.dc:creator: @Ashley3 Ashley
item.description:
@Ashley3 wrote:

Mine get deleted within two hours of me posting new links. Gay Jagex.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex blocking all file downloads?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

there has been a surge in files being deleted. i think we need a more reliable filesharing host for our servers because if no one reuploads we lose a lot of good files

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:

MATT IS GAY:

I do see it from theirs… I’ve been in this RSPS business for like 6 years.

6 years but you’re having trouble finding a Base?

item.title: Jagex blocking all file downloads?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“MATT IS GAY, post:6, topic:466365”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=580894.msg4150156#msg4150156 date=1352397940]

[center]
True, but the last 50 threads said jagex closed the mediafire and uppit links. :L

I got a new PI base, but I don’t want to go through adding all my PK shops back in.

I wonder if someone understands my POV/ :P[/center]

I understand your point of view but you need to see it from theirs.
[/quote]

I do see it from theirs… I’ve been in this RSPS business for like 6 years.

Thanks for non of the helpful responses. lol… :P[/quote]way to be mature about the advice he chose to take out of his time to give you.

Read full topic

@xI_c_E wrote:

The only links I know of that have been deleted because of Jagex are some links for the Matrix download, but they’ve already probably been reuploaded.

item.title: Jagex blocking all file downloads?
item.dc:creator: @MATT_IS_GAY MATT IS GAY
item.description:
@MATT_IS_GAY wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:4, topic:466365”][quote author=MATT IS GAY link=topic=580894.msg4150138#msg4150138 date=1352397474]
[center]
True, but the last 50 threads said jagex closed the mediafire and uppit links. :L

I got a new PI base, but I don’t want to go through adding all my PK shops back in.

I wonder if someone understands my POV/ :P[/center]
[/quote]
They block you due your username[/quote]

i highly doubt doubt that a website that you do not have to login will block me cause of my username. :L

[quote=“Ruby, post:5, topic:466365”][quote author=MATT IS GAY link=topic=580894.msg4150138#msg4150138 date=1352397474]
[center]
True, but the last 50 threads said jagex closed the mediafire and uppit links. :L

I got a new PI base, but I don’t want to go through adding all my PK shops back in.

I wonder if someone understands my POV/ :P[/center]
[/quote]

I understand your point of view but you need to see it from theirs.[/quote]

I do see it from theirs… I’ve been in this RSPS business for like 6 years.

Thanks for non of the helpful responses. lol…

item.title: Jagex blocking all file downloads?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“MATT IS GAY, post:1, topic:466365”][center]Every source I see, that I would like to use as a nice base, fagex seems to have deleted the download.

Is this the case for anyone else? [/center][/quote]

Not as far as I know, it’s just the hosts deleting files that haven’t been used in a while. Also, if you had worked for 8 years on your game and people started putting it on filesharing websites I’m sure you’d have it removed.

Read full topic
